description:
Leah is the quintessential California girl. Tall,
blond, long legged, tan, shaved, and beautiful. This
19 year old girl next door loves sex and likes bondage
- a great combination! She contacted us, so who are
we to refuse such a little hottie? We found out early
that she likes bondage but not pain. We also found out
that she is very ticklish! Despite her dislike for
it, she still took a moderate amount of pain, since we
mixed the pain with pleasure and kept her on the edge
for the entire shoot. So welcome Leah to her first
Hogtied experience.
title: Leah Wilde
